entry.def: A person or animal who is obedient does what they are told to do.

example.ex: He was very respectful at home and obedient to his parents...
example.tran: 他在家里对父母十分恭敬顺从。

example.ex: What a sweet, obedient little girl she was in the sixth grade.
example.tran: 她上六年级的时候是个多么可爱温顺的小女孩啊！

sentences.sentence: "obediently she slipped off her right shoe and stocking"
